title: Jared Bendis, Booker T, Cleveland School of the Arts and Cafe Tia Juana
teaser: Dee Perry welcomes back our resident tech guru Jared Bendis of Case Western Reserve University to sound off on the latest technology news. Plus we share a conversation with Booker T. Jones who plays The Music Box Supper Club tonight. We also meet the winning students of the Cleveland School of the Arts Festival of New Works.  And ideastream's Tony Ganzer reports on the historic music club Cafe Tia Juana.
